title: I am a PIM System Integrator
description: I am a PIM system integrator or partner who manages Akeneo projects. For my customers, I want to get access to the Enterprise licence, manage the cloud instance or get access to the support.

get-source-code.title: Manage the access to the PIM Enterprise archive and extensions
get-source-code.description: I start an on Premise or Flexibility project and I want to get the archive from the Enterprise Repository to install it and start to develop.

manage-flexibility-instance.title: Set up and manage the access to a Flexibility cloud instance
manage-flexibility-instance.description: I want to set up an instance and manage the access to the instance server

manage-serenity-instance.title: Set up a Serenity cloud instance
manage-serenity-instance.description: I want to set up a Serenity instance.

manage-onboarder-instance.title: Set up an Onboarder cloud instance
manage-onboarder-instance.description: I want to set up an Onboarder instance.

manage-shared-catalogs-instance.title: Set up a Shared Catalogs instance
manage-shared-catalogs-instance.description: I want to set up a Shared Catalogs instance.

support-access.title: Get Helpdesk access
support-access.description: Manage the access to the Akeneo Helpdesk for your team.
